class bench.templates.Param(name, type, *, default=None, description=None, min=None, max=None)

Bases: Generic[T]

Class containing information about a parameter.

Parameters:

  • name (str) – Name of the parameter.

  • type (type[T]) – Type of the parameter.

  • default (T | None) – Default value of the parameter.

  • description (str | None) – Description of the parameter.

  • min (int | float | None) – Minimum value of the parameter.

  • max (int | float | None) – Maximum value of the parameter.
